scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @who/elements && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ" "npm run start -w who"
scripts.start-proxied: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @who/elements && cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently -k "npm run start:happ-proxied" "npm run start -w who"
scripts.start-rerun: cross-env HC_PORT=8888 concurrently -k "npm run build:watch -w @who/elements" "hc s run 0 -p 8888" "npm run start -w who"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && npm t -w tests
scripts.start:happ: rimraf .hc* && RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./dna/workdir/happ/who.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a who network mdns
scripts.start:happ-proxied: rimraf .hc* && RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./dna/workdir/happ/who.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a who network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://SYVd4CF3BdJ4DS7KwLLgeU3_DbHoZ34Y-qroZ79DOs8/kitsune-quic/h/165.22.32.11/p/5779/--
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run build -w @who/elements && npm run package -w who && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack ./dna/workdir/happ
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack ./dna/workdir/dna
scripts.build:zome: cd dna && CARGO_TARGET_DIR=target cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf ui/apps/who/node_modules/  && rimraf ui/lib/node_modules && rimraf test/node_modules
